forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
